metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugins using cursor-agent

plugins.name: consultant
plugins.description: Multi-model AI consultation using cursor-agent. Supports consultation, research, and deliberation modes.

plugins.name: skill-utils
plugins.description: Utilities for creating and validating Claude Code skills. Scaffolds new skills for plugins or repositories.

plugins.name: history-analyser
plugins.description: Search and summarise Claude Code conversation history. Find past discussions and generate work summaries.

plugins.name: workflow-tools
plugins.description: Code review, cleanup, refactoring, PEP document workflow tools, and browser testing agent.

plugins.name: cursor-sync
plugins.description: Syncs Claude Code plugins to Cursor skills and commands directories with launchd watcher.

plugins.name: commit-commands
plugins.description: Git commit workflow commands: commit, push and PR, branch cleanup.
